entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Changes 2002. The opinion of the adult population about the democratic political culture in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F54: TÁRKI Changes 2002. The opinion of the adult population about the democratic political culture in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Lepsényi, Ágnes
entry.dcterms:description: opinions about democracy, democratic society; trust in public institutions; subjective financial situation, economic expectations; evaluation of the economic participation of the state; political prejudices; evaluation of NATO membership and participation; opinions about the EU accession; national consciousness, national identity; popularity of politicians, party preferences
entry.dcterms:subject: political ideology
mass political behavior, attitudes
social welfare policy and systems
political institutions, public administration
person
survey data
time-series
Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the Leslie Kish key and the random walking method.
face-to-face interview
B
